Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Reroute at Foster/Kimball
ShortDescription: 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Pulaski, Bryn Mawr and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Foster/Kimball.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Pulaski, Bryn Mawr and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Foster/Kimball.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: No trains between O'Hare and Jefferson Park
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between O'Hare and Jefferson Park due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at Rosemont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended between O'Hare and Jefferson Park due to an unauthorized person on the tracks at Rosemont.

As a result, trains are operating only between Forest Park and Jefferson Park at this time.

Shuttle buses available between O'Hare and Jefferson Park to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
